item.title: Honda Finally Comes Through
item.description:
So, previous I ranted on about an issue with my car that I brought up with Honda Canada, complaining about Kanata Honda and their ridiculous justification for the key cylinders in my car to wear out so quickly.

Well, Honda Canada did, in fact, get back to me. A nice …
item.dc:creator: Michael P. Soulier

item.title: A Letter to Honda Canada
item.description: I recently had reason to write to the CEO of Honda Canada, Mr. Jerry Chenkin, to outline why I am less than pleased with my 2010 Honda Fit, and ensure that he, or whomever ends up reading this, has the full story of what our experience with his company has …
item.dc:creator: Michael P. Soulier
